description: After updating to Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.97, users may experience noticeable performance degradation. This can manifest as slow page loading times, lagging interface responses, or unresponsive browser actions. Users utilizing older versions such as 118.0.5993.159 may also see similar issues until they upgrade to the latest version, ensuring they are protected against previously identified vulnerabilities as documented in KB-119.0.2151.97.
